Product.Name: Wallace & Barnes slim-fit jean in drydock worn wash
Product.Description:
A new collection of old favorites, built using the foundations of traditional workwear, vintage military uniforms and classic outdoor gear as our guide. We've taken the pieces we love, from the obscure to the truly iconic, and evolved them into a limited-edition range of essentials we feel no guy should go without. Constructed from 12 3/4-ounce right-hand twill, it's an unsanforized, red-line selvedge from one of Japan's oldest mills. Inspired by a vintage pair picked up on a research trip to Tokyo, our design team spent ages getting the wash just right. A slim-straight cut with a mid-rise in a traditional 5-pocket style with genuine workwear details and construction throughout. Button fly. A Collector's Item. USA. Machine wash.
  • Sits below waist.
  • Straight through hip, slim through thigh, with a slim leg.

Product.Name: Wallace & Barnes slim-fit jean in rinse wash
Product.Description:
A new collection of old favorites, built using the foundations of traditional workwear, vintage military uniforms and classic outdoor gear as our guide. We've taken the pieces we love, from the obscure to the truly iconic, and evolved them into a limited-edition range of essentials we feel no guy should go without. Constructed from 14-ounce right-hand twill, it's an unsanforized, red-line selvedge from one of Japan's oldest mills. A slim-straight cut with a mid-rise in a traditional 5-pocket style with genuine workwear details and construction throughout. Given a single rinse to allow for shrinkage. Doughnut button fly. Low-profile steel rivets. Two-needle felled inseam. Reinforced cotton twill pocket bags. Hidden selvedge inside fifth pocket. Bar-tacked back pockets with concealed rivets. Rear selvedge cotton patch. USA. Machine wash.
  • Sits below waist.
  • Straight through hip, slim through thigh, with a slim leg.

Product.Name: 484 Slim-Fit Garment-Dyed Jean In Dill
Product.Description:
A great alternative to your basic blues. Our newest fit a slimmer version of our classic and exclusively ours in cotton denim, garment-dyed for a vintage look and feel. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Vintage slim-fit jean in resin crinkle wash
Product.Description:

  • Slimmer fit.
  • Sits below waist, slim through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: Straight-fit jean in indigo medium worn wash
Product.Description:
We think our updated wash strikes the perfect balance between dark and light. Each pair is washed and ringspun for that same shade of aged indigo you'd find in old-time American jeans, then hand distressed for a broken-in, vintage look. Cotton. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits at waist, straight through hip and thigh, with a straight leg.

Product.Name: Straight-fit jean in vintage worn wash
Product.Description:
Traditional cotton denim, lightly washed to preserve the rich, inky indigo color, then ringspun and thoroughly hand worked to get all the great character of heavy wear. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits at waist, straight through hip and thigh, with a straight leg.

Import. Machine wash.

Product.Description:

  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew 484 Slim-Fit Denim Jeans
Product.Description: Blue denim slim-fit 484 jeans from J.Crew with a zip fly and five pocket set. These rustic jeans come deliberately aged for a look that's pure vintage Americana. Reference timeless workwear by teaming with a plaid shirt. Shown here with a Hartford cardigan, Margaret Howell shirt and Common Projects shoes.

Product.Name: Straight-fit flannel-lined jean in carbon worn wash
Product.Description:
Made of our left-hand cotton twill denim, lightly washed to preserve the rich, inky indigo color, then ringspun and thoroughly hand worked to get all the great character of heavy wear. It's fully lined in flannel for extra warmth and outdoor wear. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits at waist, straight through hip and thigh, with a straight leg.

Product.Name: 484 Slim-Fit Selvedge Jean In Resin Crinkle Wash
Product.Description:
Our slimmest fit yet this jean is a favorite among our designers. Crafted in authentic selvedge cotton denim from one of Japan's oldest and most renowned mills. Made with denim woven on the original 100-year-old narrow looms, each pair is stonewashed and hand-finished for a look that's perfectly, well, unfinished. Button fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. A Collector's Item. Import. Machine wash.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Relaxed-fit jean in dark worn wash
Product.Description:
This jean is thoroughly hand worked to get all the great character of heavy wear but lightly washed to preserve the rich, inky indigo color. Traditional cotton denim, ringspun for a vintage feel. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling with reinforced back pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Relaxed fit.
  • Sits below waist, relaxed through hip and thigh, with a slightly wider leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew Vintage Slim-Fit Jeans
Product.Description: Vintage-style slim cream jeans with a zip front and five pocket set. In soft, pre-worn denim, these classic jeans will seem as if they've been a wardrobe staple for years. Adding a sporty jacket and hiking boots will create a look tailored to the great outdoors. Shown here with a John Smedley sweater, Polo Ralph Lauren jacket and A.P.C. shoes.

Product.Name: 484 Slim-Fit Jean In Raw Selvedge Denim
Product.Description:
Our slimmest fit yet this jean is a favorite among our designers. This is the jean for the denim purist: made of genuine cotton selvedge in our special raw indigo wash. For those not in the know, raw denim feels stiffer at first and then fades and distresses according to the individual wearer; simply put, it's as authentic as it gets. We recommend wearing with darker items.) Button fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. A Collector's Item. Import. Machine wash.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew Vintage Selvedge Straight-Leg Jeans
Product.Description: Straight-leg selvedge blue denim jeans from J.Crew in a washed finish with five pocket set and button fly. The vintage effect of these classic jeans gives the impression that they've been a wardrobe favourite for years. Add a hint of check for an all-American look. Shown here with a Levi's Vintage Clothing T-shirt, Marc by Marc Jacobs shirt, A.P.C cardigan and Maison Martin Margiela shoes.

Product.Name: J.Crew 484 Slim-Fit Raw Selvedge Jeans
Product.Description: Slim-fit raw selvedge denim jeans from J.Crew with five pockets, a button closure and fly and a selvedge edge on the coin pocket. Rigid denim will soften over time to create a patina and fit unique to each pair; spend time breaking in your rigid denim for a highly personal addition to your casual wardrobe. Shown here with an S.N.S. Herning sweater, rag & bone boots and a Marc by Marc Jacobs bag.

Product.Name: 484 Slim-Fit Jean In Worn Grey Wash
Product.Description:
Our newest fit a slimmer version of our classic and exclusively ours. We wash these jeans with a special treatment to give them a great crinkled look. Traditional cotton denim, ringspun for a vintage feel. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew 484 Slim-Fit Selvedge Jeans
Product.Description: Slim-fit selvedge denim jeans from J.Crew in blue with orange stitching, brass rivets, five pocket set and button-up fly. Classic, easy and effortless, these jeans are a failsafe option when the weekend beckons. Worn with simple basics they are a low-key, masculine look. Shown here with a Marc by Marc Jacobs shirt and Quoddy shoes.

Product.Name: J.Crew 484 Rinsed Slim-Fit Jeans
Product.Description: Rinsed blue jeans from J.Crew with orange stitching, five pocket set, zip-up fly and black rivets. A solid pair of blue jeans is a design classic and a wardrobe essential. Pair this J.Crew style with crisp blues and sharp white shades for an effortless everyday look. Shown here with a Calvin Klein Underwear T-shirt, Margaret Howell shirt and Polo Ralph Lauren shoes.
